text: Pustosyolov () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Yelenovskoye Rural Settlement of Koshekhablsky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 8 as of 2018. There are 4 streets. == Geography == The khutor is located 15 km east from Krasnogvardeyskoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Koshekhablsky District
title: Pustosyolov
